DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : To demonstrate immunogenicity term antibody response follow primary vaccination Korean infant pneumococcal conjugate vaccine GSK 1024850A compare Prevenar™ co-administered Haemophilus influenzae type b ( Hib ) vaccine child first 6 month life . To evaluate safety/reactogenicity term solicit unsolicited symptom serious adverse event follow primary vaccination Korean infant pneumococcal conjugate vaccine GSK 1024850A .
DOC.brief_title: Primary Vaccination Course Children Receiving Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine GSK 1024850A Prevenar™ Hiberix™
